Address.Line: Beatson Institute, Garscube Estate, Switchback Road, Bearsden

Sample.Title: Ribo-Seq siCNOT1 Replicate 1

Channel.Treatment-Protocol: Cells treated with 20nM CNOT1-targeting siRNA for 48 hrs
Channel.Growth-Protocol: HEK293 cells grown in DMEM with 10% FBS and 2mM L-glutamine
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Cells were lysed with 400ul lysis buffer (20mM Tris-Cl pH 7.4, 150mM NaCl, 5mM MgCl2, 1mM DTT and 100ug/ml CHX, 25U/ml Turbo DNase, 1% Triton X100), 50ul lysate taken for total RNA and the rest digested with RNase I and ran on a sucrose cushion to produce the RPF sample All samples were rRNA depleted using Illumina RiboZero Gold; libraries for Ribo-Seq were prepared with Nextflex small RNA-seq; libraries for RNA-Seq were prepared with Nextflex rapid directional qRNA-seq

Sample.Data-Processing: Library strategy: Ribo-Seq cutadapt v1.16 to remove adapter sequence deduplication of UMIs with cd-hit-dup v4.6.6 alignment to rRNA fasta file with bowtie (v1.1.2) alignment to transcriptome with bowtie (v1.1.2) get counts of RPF start positions with python script Supplementary_files_format_and_content: csv file with DESeq2 results for log2FC ribosome protected fragments, log2FC total RNA and log2FC translational efficiency (siCNOT1/siControl) Supplementary_files_format_and_content: RPF counts at each nt normalised for mRNA abundance (TPM of Total RNA) Total RNA samples cutadapt v1.16 to remove adapter sequence deduplication of UMIs with cd-hit-dup v4.6.6 alignment to genome with tophat2 (v2.1.1) HTseq (v0.9.1) used for counts hg38, gencode v28 Supplementary_files_format_and_content: RPF counts at each nt normalised for mRNA abundance (TPM of Total RNA)

Series.Title: Ribosome Profiling with CNOT1 depletion
Series.Summary: Ribosome profiling in HEK293 cells with and without the depletion of CNOT1. This allows the determination of translational efficiency and nucleotide resolution of ribosome occupancy.
Series.Overall-Design: Ribosome profiling for HEK293 cells treated with either control of CNOT1-targeting siRNA for 48hrs, conducted for three biological replicates. Ribo-zero treated total RNA samples are also included. The control ribosome profiling data has also previously been used in Wilczynska et al. eIF4A2 drives repression of translation at initiation by Ccr4-Not through purine-rich motifs in the 5'UTR. Genome Biol 2019 Dec 2;20(1):262. PMID: 31791371 (GSE134517)
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
